title: Ship-Busters
creator_credit: Great Britain. Royal Air Force. Film Production Unit
brief_description: A tribute to the British Dominion Allied Squadrons of the Royal Air Force Coastal Command who took part in the campaign against German-controlled shipping along the coast of Europe during the years 1939-45. The R.A.F. in Norway during WWII.
